attributes.action: Please support Mr Andrew Turner - he is the honourable MP for the Isle of Wight and has done much to promote the interests of the Isle of Wight
attributes.additional_details: Mr Turner has made a significant contribution on the Isle of Wight and has represented constituents during a period of great changes in the local authority. He has kept our Island as one constituency which has pleased many people. He supports people in need and goes out of his way, aided by his very good team in his office including Carole Dennett.
